fields.name: Indian Palm
fields.description: The Indian Palm brings simple elegance to any room and it’s really easy to care for. It will tolerate low light and infrequent watering, but as with any plant, you’ll get better results if you treat them well. It will also appreciate a feed with liquid fertiliser once per month in spring and summer.

fields.name: Golden Pothos
fields.description: The golden pothos os a versatile plant that can grow free-standing or can be trained to climb walls. A favourite among houseplant lovers.

fields.name: Bamboo
fields.description: This is a superweapon in the arsenal of the plantscaper, as it is one of the only indoor plants that actually thrives in shaded spots.
